alert.note: Alert for Inland Jackson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:08PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson County through 745 PM CDT... At 708 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Telferner, or 7 miles east of Victoria, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edna, Cordele and Morales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
